ALTER PROCEDURE Announcement.SelectCurrentAnnouncementsFor @FacilityId int, @RolesList varchar(max), @CurrentDate datetime AS BEGIN
DECLARE @LookupTable table (id INT) INSERT INTO @LookupTable SELECT item FROM Utility.ArrayToTable(Utility.StringToArray(@RolesList,','))
SELECT Announcements.Id, Announcements.StopDate, Announcements.Description, Announcements.Author, Announcements.SaveDate, AnnouncementsToRolesToFacilities.FacilityId, AnnouncementsToRolesToFacilities.RoleId FROM Announcement.AnnouncementsToRolesToFacilities, Announcement.Announcements WHERE StopDate >= @CurrentDate AND FacilityId = @FacilityId AND RoleId IN ( SELECT id FROM @LookupTable ) AND Announcements.Id = AnnouncementsToRolesToFacilities.AnnouncementId ORDER BY Announcements.Id, FacilityId, RoleId
END
